descriptions: Writing lacks clarity and coherence, making it difficult to understand the main idea.
Writing demonstrates minimal clarity and coherence; the main idea is difficult to follow.
Writing shows some clarity and coherence; the main idea is somewhat understandable but lacks smooth transitions.
Writing is generally clear and coherent; the main idea is understandable with some logical organization.
Writing is clear and coherent; the main idea is easily understandable with logical organization and effective transitions.
Writing is exceptionally clear, coherent, and compelling; the main idea is clearly articulated with seamless transitions and logical flow.
Ideas are not developed, and supporting details are absent.
Ideas are minimally developed, with few or irrelevant supporting details.
Ideas are somewhat developed, with some supporting details that may lack relevance or depth.
Ideas are adequately developed, with relevant supporting details that provide some depth.
Ideas are well-developed, with relevant and detailed support that enhances understanding.
Ideas are exceptionally well-developed, with rich, insightful, and compelling support that demonstrates a deep understanding of the topic.
Writing lacks organization, making it difficult to follow the writer's train of thought.
Writing demonstrates minimal organization; the structure is unclear and disjointed.
Writing shows some organization; the structure is somewhat evident but may lack logical progression.
Writing is generally well-organized; the structure is logical and easy to follow.
Writing is well-organized; the structure enhances the clarity and effectiveness of the writing.
Writing is exceptionally well-organized; the structure is sophisticated and contributes to the overall impact of the writing.
Writing style is inappropriate for the task, purpose, and audience.
Writing style is minimally appropriate for the task, purpose, and audience.
Writing style is somewhat appropriate for the task, purpose, and audience but may lack consistency.
Writing style is generally appropriate for the task, purpose, and audience.
Writing style is appropriate and effective for the task, purpose, and audience, enhancing the overall impact of the writing.
Writing style is sophisticated, engaging, and perfectly tailored to the task, purpose, and audience, demonstrating mastery of language.
